p: We fit model ( 1) based on the reported excess GBS cases time series shown by the dark blue dotted line in Fig 2. This was repeated for different sets of baseline parameters, with several different (possible) values of η (asymptomatic ZIKV relative infectivity) and θ (proportion of symptomatic ZIKV infections) considered. The θ = 0.5 simulations correspond to a 1:1 ratio of the symptomatic to asymptomatic ZIKV infection of [ 22]. Simulations with θ = 0.2 correspond to the 4:1 ratio of the symptomatic to asymptomatic ZIKV infection of [ 11].
